an interactive diary entry

name: Soko
description:
A teeny Sokoban for Playdate, packed with over 400 puzzles and the ability to load your own levels.

There are 7 unlockable characters to play with (plus one Catalog-exclusive bonus hero). Players can collect these characters by solving puzzles.

name: Dead Island: Zombie Hunter
description: An oasis island originally rich in resources, due to the attack of the virus, everyone was infected with the mutated virus, and the whole island was full of the breath of death... How do you defeat these zombies when you are the only survivor on the dead island? Can you survive?...

name: Sally Can't Sleep
description: Sally Summers, an average Jill living in her apartment in L.A, has trouble getting to sleep one night. As it turns out, her favourite pillow needs some new feathers! Are you a bad enough dude to collect the feathers in this First-person Dream exploration Collectathon Platformer?

name: Tartarus Longo Itinere
description: Tartarus is a DungeonCrawler in Card format that will drop you into the fiery Inferno. Use your skills to kill as many creatures as possible and successfully pass the Mephisto's test... The Long Itinere.

name: Dogs Day
description: Dogs Day is an incredibly addictive puzzle game in which your favorite furry doggies are waiting for you.

name: Stacks: Space!
description: Stacks: Space is a space-themed base builder card game with rogue-like elements. Buy booster packs to get new cards, discover craft recipes by stacking cards together, create structures, manufacture drones and droids, defend your base from enemies, visit distant planets, and more!

name: Galaxy Revo 2
description: Play as a spaceship in space full of dangers. Your job is to dodge enemy spaceships and fuel up new opportunities for you. The game is great for relaxing.

name: When Sword Sinks Into Flowers
description: Ford Gillia Kingdom, where the ancient magicians' legend still remains. On a certain day Adelite, belonging to the kingdom's chivalric order was cast a death-promising curse by a man who identifies himself as a "magician". The feud between knights and magicians is beyond epochs...

name: Notes of the Young Lady: In Turbulent Times
description: Sin descripción

name: OMSI 2: Iveco Bus-Familie Urbanway
description: This bus is the successor of the Irisbus Citélis. Despite its similarity to its predecessor, the Iveco Urbanway is lighter and more spacious. With the AddOn Iveco Bus Family Urbanway, this bus is now featured as a virtual variant in the OMSI simulator.

name: Viticulture: Essential Edition - Tuscany Expansion
description: The Tuscany Expansion includes 3 new features: An extended game board, special workers and structures. Choose which features you want to play with or simply play with all of them!

name: Dawn of Hell
description: Explore the cursed village and discover the sinister secrets it hides. Survive a terrible night and solve challenging puzzles as you try to escape the curse that plagues the place. Experience tension and fear at every step in this horror game.

name: Flashback
description: Flashback is a strategy game oriented to your choices. You will play the role of a deliveryman and live in a turbulent city for a month. You will meet various characters and experience events, and those characters' fates will cross and they will usher in their own futures based on your choices.

name: The Test: Secrets of the Soul
description: You will answer a series of questions that will reveal things from deep within. Some will be uncomfortable, but with great knowledge comes great sacrifice. Can you make it all the way through The Test, and are you SURE you want the answers you seek? For it is time to unlock "Secrets of the Soul..."

name: My Dream Setup
description: My Dream Setup is a simulation game about building the room you've always dreamed of. A huge selection of furniture, computers and their accessories, posters, pictures, plants, and other interior details await you. What is your imagination capable of?

name: Phylakterion
description: Phylakterion is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game. You and your friends will enter different locations in search of a possessed vessel. Search, Identify, and Destroy the vessel and the entity inhabiting it – and be quick, or the entity will find you first!

name: Gatedelvers
description: Gatedelvers is a dungeon-crawling roguelite. Fight, sneak, cast and jump your way through hostile worlds, alone or with friends. Make use of everything you find and upgrade your gear to your liking. Discover the lost worlds beyond the Gates.

name: Mythargia
description: You are a journalist in search of your breakthrough story. A promising lead takes you to the abandoned island of Mythargia where you have to discover its buried history connecting two different dimensions.

name: Xxx_Cyberrat_Xxx
description: An infamous cybercriminal and owner of a luxurious underground marketplace tries to reclaim his position in the distrustful society of blackhat hackers and druglords. You must utilize your hacking and intelligence gathering skills in a race with your worsening mental state and sudden hallucinations.

name: Echoes of Mayhem
description: Echoes of Mayhem is a roguelite arpg souls-like. You'll fight through a procedural dungeon of monsters and bosses in an attempt to reforge the world. You'll score loot along the way and gather resources to upgrade your town and unlock new tiers of items and abilities.

name: Johnny Lionface
description: A twisted story-driven action-RPG with endless ways to build your party of colorful combatants.

name: Back to Ashes
description: Explore alternative realities while trying to save Your own from approaching annihilation. Dark fantasy rpg action game which will take You on a journey deep into the realms of Errent.

name: My First Date RPG: Oriana - Story Two
description: Sin descripción

name: Re Watch
description:
5 minute walking sim with minor psychological horror stuff, mainly went for the eerie look, made in a week so don't expect much, still tried my best.

As for the story, find out yourself :)...

name: Cosmic Connection
description:
In the distant future, teams of barely-qualified astronauts are sent out on a hail mary mission to find a habitable planet for humanity to migrate to.

Your group is assigned to planet K2-288Bb orbiting a small star hundreds of lightyears out from our Solar System. Communication with Earth is impossible from this distance, so you have missions you must complete and then return to Earth with your findings.

The group dynamics go topsy-turvy when one of your crew members dies under mysterious circumstances. It's up to you to figure out who the culprit is and bring them to justice.

What choices will you make? Who will you trust, if anyone? With six endings, plus a secret ending, the possibilities are expansive.

name: Make New Way
description:
Multiple sokoban puzzle!

After reaching the goal, a new puzzle begins using the stage as it is!

name: Devotion
description: Devotion is a partial conversion of RatArena to Quake III Arena.

name: Bladerite: Retribution
description: Bladerite offers action game enthusiasts a unique opportunity to polishing gaming skills like never before on cross-platform. Not only can you earn rewards based on defeating opponents in each match, but you can also acquire upgradeable patterns that enhance your game experience. Immerse yourself in a world where the in-game economy is supported by cryptocurrency.

name: Blue Straggler

name: Parasomnia

name: MicroCrawl
description: Microcrawl is a bite sized point and click 2D adventure text hybrid presented from the first person in which you'll have to navigate your way back through a dark fantasy world to get back home.

name: Digital Pierrot Museum
description: Digital Pierrot Museum is a free virtual museum presenting the experience of navigating through a museum of digital and multimedia art through VR and Windows platforms.

name: SomethingWithSpace
description: A desolate and derelict station has been uncovered. You've been tasked with investigating, only to find the station's automated defenses are still active! How is it still... "alive"? Pilot your ship and find out! Can you make it out... "alive"? This helps me get through school! Hope you enjoy!

name: Quiz Thiz Spain: Silver Edition

name: Primitive Hearts
description: A classic-style turn-based RPG. On a nearby planet, the situation grows grim as the Titania Empire continues its conquest to take over the world. Unable to sit idly by, a lone adventurer sets out to stop them.

name: Neko Dating Sim
description: Neko Dating Sim is a non-linear life simulation visual novel where you date multiple catgirls at the same time! Each girl has their own unique personalities, likes and dislikes. Your goal is to build relationships with each of them and become closer than just friends.

name: Mystery
description: Darkness and silence. Then a beep that precedes the opening of the cell in the isolation ward. A bright light turns on in the camera. You are again being taken for questioning about the disappearance of a group of young guys. The story is full of secrets and only you can put all the dots.

description: A beautiful stranger appears at your doorstep. Will you let her in? Dive into an erotic nightmare and decide the fates of those around you in this free mystic thriller visual novel.

Port of Mistake to the Source Engine

Mistake: Source is a fan-made port of the MISTAKE of Half-Life mod developed by Ashkandi, to the source engine. The original mod is a horror-themed first-person shooter.

name: The Settlers: New Allies - Starter Pack
description: Gear up and explore the world of The Settlers: New Allies with the Starter Pack, including skins, credits, and more.

name: Piano: Learn and Play
description:
Become a modern Mozart with Piano: Learn and Play, the best piano learning app for Nintendo Switch.
Well-known and beloved melodies
Nursery rhymes or other popular songs make time more enjoyable for children around the world. Sing and play with family, friends or at school.
A marvel of modernity
A small, handy musical instrument that you can take anywhere you want. Relax and immerse yourself in the sounds.

name: Spy Balloon Freakout
description:
You are a Spy Balloon floating in enemy airspace. A fighter jet has been scrambled to intercept and shoot you down! Worse, surface-to-air missiles are aiming right at you!! Fly! Fly for as long as possible, and see how long you can stay aloft!!

"Saddle up, airman! We've got a bogey at Angels 40!" -Someone, Somewhere

name: Manga Maker's Mega Milkers
description: Your favorite lewd artist has a proposition for you: Show her your cock, and she'll show you her tits. Continue to collaborate with Yuko, exploring each other's fantasies to collect erotic reference material for her big manga debut!

name: Skateboard Drifting Simulator with Maxwell Cat: The Game
description: Skateboard Drifting Simulator with Maxwell Cat: The Game is an exhilarating skateboarding game that features meme characters navigating levels filled with obstacles. Customise your skateboard and perform stunts to earn points. With its vibrant art style and intuitive controls, it offers a fun arcade experience suitable for all skill levels.

description: How well do you know your video game trivia? Challenge yourself or have a video game trivia night with friends and family in Party Mode. It comes with the most popular video game categories including Arcade, Atari, Nintendo, Personal Computer, PlayStation, SEGA, and Xbox!

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Ryoma Growth Support
description:
The Ryoma Growth Support Kit contains consumable items that will increase Sakamoto Ryoma's Experience Points, as well as a battle revival item.

It contains:
- Red Daifuku X3

- Blue Daifuku x3
- Green Daifuku x3

name: Atom
description:
Atom is an interesting idle game where you can collect all the known elements from Hydrogen to Oganesson.
In this idle game you will be able to go from Schoolboy to Professor with a worldwide reputation

name: The Exile of Aphrodisia
description:
The Exile of Aphrodisia is a transformation-themed game inspired by The Odyssey and The Oregon Trail.

One thousand years ago, the first humans crossed through a mysterious portal into a new magical world and settled on the island continent known as Aphrodisia. Now, however, humanity has just lost a war against the powerful Demon Empire and is being hunted down as slaves.

The last remaining hope for freedom is the ruined city of Niu Heym where, with any luck, at least some of your wards will be able to return to the humans' ancestral homeworld before the portal-gate closes for another thousand years.

You are an elf guide tasked with leading a small party of humans over a thousand kilometers west across all of Aphrodisia to the city of Niu Heym and the Portal Gate. With any luck, at least some of your wards will be able to return to the humans' ancestral homeworld before the portal gate runs out of rift charges. It is your job to try and get them there, but forces are acting against you, wishing to take some, or all, of your charges and to transform or enslave them.

This will be a long and dangerous trek… and you may not walk out on the same two feet! Are you up to the challenge?

name: Not For Broadcast: Season Pass
description:
Channel One is more than just the news! The Not For Broadcast Season Pass grants to access to all three of the upcoming episodes of Not For Broadcast as they release.

Each episode is a self-contained story, set early into the events of the main game.

name: Ibis AM
description: All I want you to do is catch fish and search for others who seem hungry. You are only a bird.

name: Farmside
description:
Place plots, plant crops, harvest, and repeat. Build beautiful orchards filled with bountiful fruit trees and raise chickens, cows, and other animals who produce agricultural products.

Craft and cook unique recipes from your produce and fill orders from the local townsfolk and don't forget to stock up on seeds from Dunn’s seed stand.

description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Aqua Puzzle your way through 220 new levels - levels include all mechanics from Years 1 and 2!

name: The Light in the Darkness
description: The Light in the Darkness tells the story of a working-class family of Polish Jews in France during the Holocaust. It is the first videogame to portray the Holocaust accurately, releasing free for educational purposes.

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Like a Dragon: Ishin! is an action-adventure game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. Released in February 2023, it is a remake of the 2014 Japan-exclusive Ryu Ga Gotoku Ishin! and reimagines the Like a Dragon series in a historical setting. Set in the Bakumatsu period of Japan (mid-1800s), the game follows Sakamoto Ryoma, modelled after Kazuma Kiryu, as he navigates political intrigue, conspiracies, and samurai combat while seeking revenge for his mentor's murder.

The gameplay combines swordplay, gunfighting, and hand-to-hand combat, with a mix of main story missions and side activities, including minigames and historical recreations of series staples.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

• Shinsengumi Captain’s Set
• Ryoma Growth Support Kit
• Sword Upgrade Materials Kit
• Gun Upgrade Materials Kit
• Third Division Armament Expansion Kit
• The Dragon of Dojima Skin

description: Hentai Secrets is an adventure game with a lot of puzzles and traps, playing as a naked anime girl, you will have to go through difficult puzzles that can break your brain, oh yes, specially for tired of traps and difficult tasks, the game has a small cinema with juicy hentai uh.

description: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe. A new puzzle game experience awaits.

name: Dr Smart Space Adventure

name: 4x4 Offroad Driver 2

description: This is a story about an alien who had a shipwreck on a planet where people lived and now he needs to figure out how he can leave this planet.After all, people's technologies are far behind those that he has on the planet.

name: Plains of Pain
description: Survival multiplayer post-apocalyptic game. Feel the final end of the world, where hope has died. Explore the autonomous post-apocalyptic multiplayer open world and try to survive in these Plains of Pain.

name: Alien on the Radar
description: Multiplayer game of hiding and seeking. Become an alien and use stealth to deceive others, or a marine and survive long enough to escape.

name: Kiss Effect
description: Space... Boundless space with secrets, beauty, and icy calm. At a distance of hundreds of light years, there is no shelter around except for your spaceship... It is your home, it is your place of relaxation and love...

name: Metal Glove: Exodus

name: CyberHeroes Arena DX
description: Customize your robot for unique combat and fun!

name: Celeste Strawberry Jam
description: The Celeste Strawberry Jam Collaboration is a community mod for Celeste featuring 5 difficulty levels for new and experienced players alike, with over a hundred unique levels to play.

name: Tama Cannon
description: Tama is a curious creature in a strange world full of floating cannons.

name: Farming Fever
description: Farming Fever is an engaging time management game where you can become both a farmer and a chef at the same time. You'll have to manage your farm, harvest crops, cook, and complete customers' orders.

name: Elemental Adventure
description: Embark on an action packed adventure! Elemental Adventure is a fast paced build-oriented ARPG. Featuring 8 distinct classes each with 12 unique skills, all with their own progression trees. Craft powerful gems to further customize endless possible combinations and face the ultimate challenge!

name: Monsters of Seabrook
description: Capture, train, and fuse together minions into your ultimate weapon against foes and the gym leaders of Seabrook. Become the resident Monster Expert and collect them all!

name: Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator
description: Ages of Conflict is a versatile Map Simulation game where you spawn and observe custom AI nations battle it out across an infinite number of worlds. Command nations to nudge the world events into your liking.

name: Memory Traces: Egypt
description: Memory Traces:Egypt. is a 3D puzzle game where the player needs to repair destroyed artifacts.

name: Zellige: The Tilemaker of Granada
description: Zellige : The Tilemaker of Granada is a meditative and relaxing historical game, set in medieval Al-Andalus, where you play as a skilled tilemaker and design intricate Islamic mosaic patterns to decorate a merchant family's palace. Let your creativity flow and create beautiful patterns !

name: Gigantosaurus Dino Kart
description: Race around Cretacia in a prehistoric kart championship for up to 4 players of all ages, where you can play as your favorite dino friends and even bump into the mysterious Gigantosaurus himself!

name: Tales of Symphonia Remastered: Chosen Edition
description:
Tales of Symphonia Remastered is set in the world of Sylvarant, a dying land in dire need of a constant source of mana, where legend dictates that a Chosen One will appear to regenerate and restore the world. Players will follow the adventures of Lloyd Irving and his friends as they embark on a worldwide adventure filled with unforgettable characters and an emotionally charged storyline that still resonates with fans.

Chosen Edition includes the Base Game, Metalcase, Artprints and Chibi Character Form Stickers.

name: Tales of Symphonia Remastered
description: Tales of Symphonia Remastered is set in the world of Sylvarant, a dying land in dire need of a constant source of mana, where legend dictates that a Chosen One will appear to regenerate and restore the world. Players will follow the adventures of Lloyd Irving and his friends as they embark on a worldwide adventure filled with unforgettable characters and an emotionally charged storyline that still resonates with fans.

name: The Settlers: New Allies - Deluxe Edition
description: Upgrade your game experience with the Deluxe Edition including the game, the Deluxe Pack and additional digital content.

name: Blue Fish Yokohama
description: Blue Fish Yokohama is a relaxing tile-based puzzle game. You are a fish that eats miso ramen, cheese ramen and tantanmen by jumping, bumping, bouncing and splashing through a Japanese restaurant. Solve 50 handcrafted levels with unique game mechanics.

name: Mysterious School
description: "Mysterious School" is a horror game that supports multi player online and single player. Why do girls often cry on campus at midnight? What happened to the once famous No.1 middle school? Take your partner, find out the truth that the young girl has become a zombie, and help the girl reincarnate.

name: Rise of Fox Hero
description: Rise of Fox Hero is a colorful 3D platformer with fun combat and puzzle elements. Armed with a sword and a shield, jump and fight your way through beautiful and colorful levels.

name: The Sea of Death
description: The Sea of Death is a mystery puzzle adventure in which the story revolves around the people and experiences that the protagonist, who has lost his memory due to an accident, meets in the process of regaining his memory.

name: Birth
description: Birth is a pleasantly creepy point-and-click puzzle game about living alone in a large city and constructing a creature to keep you company out of spare bones and organs you find lying around. Explore libraries, post offices, museums, cafes, and apartments that don't belong to you, solving observational puzzles hidden in personal belongings and scenery.

name: Bill and Ted's Excellent Retro Collection
description: A blast from the past! Bill & Ted's Retro Collection includes Bill & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure and Bill & Ted's Excellent Gameboy Adventure A Bogus Journey!

name: The Overlord Isn't Another Isekai Protagonist, Is He?: Chapter 1
description: Have you ever wondered what awaits you after death? At 25, Kay had no plans to die... let alone to wake up in literal HELL one day. Did he deserve such a fate, or is it all just a ridiculous mistake? Kay can’t remember his past, but he firmly believes that he doesn't belong here.

name: A Weekend in Puzzleburg
description: A Weekend in Puzzleburg is a cozy slice-of-life role-playing game. No need to fight monsters or save the world from impending doom - you've merely booked a relaxing weekend getaway in a town known for its puzzles. Welcome to Puzzleburg!

name: Sorry, We're Open
description:
Welcome to the Corporate Ladder.

Sorry, We're Open is a procedurally generated Horror CRPG Roguelite, Supermarket Simulator. As the new Manager of your local supermarket branch, you'll be expected to manage your employees, tackle both the Day and Night Shifts, and make the hard decisions to keep the store running each hour of the day.

name: Turnament
description: Turnament is a sci-fi strategy game in which you collect crystals to gain energy, and turn squares to destroy enemy drones.

name: SpaceBourne 2
description: Your legacy is calling. Prepare yourself for fast-paced space combats. Take your ship, gird on your best gears and raise your new galactic empire.

name: Evil Below
description: Evil Below is a first-person horror adventure game that combines horror elements with unique puzzle solving and stealth. The game centers around a mother searching for her son in a semi-openworld landscape filled with never-ending forests, abandoned villages and claustrophobic caverns.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York & Shadows of New York
description:
One of the most acclaimed RPGs of all time comes to life in an interactive novel in which your decisions will mark your destiny.

Enter the universe of Vampire: The Masquerade, one of the most popular role-playing games of all time, through two interactive novels created by Draw Distance and brought together in a single physical release.

name: Joon Shining
description:
Joon Shining is a golf-like platformer with a fantasy twist. Combining traditional golf & mini-golf with elements of puzzle platforming, it evolves the hit-and-wait formula of golf by adding magic!

You play as Joon - a young wizard travelling across the multiverse. As you advance through 8 unique worlds, learn to master your arcane powers to solve weird & mind-bending challenges. Harness your abilities to manipulate physics. Solve puzzles. Discover collectibles. And learn the secret of the Mage Drops…

name: The Last Haven
description: The world after a nuclear war. Manage the settlement, learn technology, make decisions, produce weapons, ammunition, organize defense, raid for supplies on other areas, do not let residents die, survive the nuclear winter.

name: The Settlers: New Allies
description:
"Nearly 30 years after the debut of The Settlers, the legendary build-up real-time strategy series returns to Windows PC."

"Forced to leave their homelands after a devastating earthquake of mysterious origins, the Settlers set sail towards the unknown in the hopes of finding a new home. Not only will they face countless new challenges, they will also become part of an ancient mystery that will change their lives forever."

name: Tanuki's Dream
description: Tanuki's Dream is a 2D top-down, arena-like dungeon crawler. Defeat enemies to appropiate their abilities and use them to your advantage! Fight your way through the kappa-infested swamp and find the hidden Tanuki village.

name: Fallout ZX
description: Little project about the Fallout saga. This is GD49Games' idea of what the game would be like if it had been released for the ZX Spectrum. Discover the 128 shelter and what will be your mission.

name: Silver Falls: White Inside Its Umbra
description: The final game released for the Wii U, the game follows of a citizen of Silver Falls as they explore a dark forest in the outskirts of the town. While the Wii remote controls the character's flashlight, the GamePad acts as a pseudo-smartphone, allowing the player to control other elements.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: From Finality, The Origin
description:
Version Kiana (6.4) of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the end of Part 1 of the main story, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Herrscher of Origin & Herrscher of Finality
• New ELF: Kiana Kaslana
• New Story Chapter XXXV: Toward a New Tomorrow
• New Animated Short: Graduation Trip
• New Featured Event: Bustling Holiday Symphony ∶||
• ...and more!

name: BustyBiz: Anna Pack
description: This very first Busty Biz DLC introduces you to feisty Finn Anna, a gamer girl who has both beauty and brains. Purchase this DLC and unlock Anna, together with a special (SFW) wallpaper!

name: Selene: Apoptosis - 18+ Adult Only Patch
description: This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content. By downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent).

name: Quaint
description: Quentin “Q” Hawthorne is a coffee-loving IT specialist living a quiet life in the small town of Millbrook. But he’s about to learn that this charming place holds a secret – it is home to a 200-years old mage association known as the Snake and Saber Society. Invited to join their ranks, he’ll now have to redefine his understanding of the world. But each step he takes on this new promising path will also bring him closer to his troubled past. Will he be able to confront it? Or will the shackles of guilt stop him from ever moving on?

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 2
description:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

As a new Raider is reported roaming the Temporal Seams, 2 capsules can be seen in the sky, landing with a crash. A group of Saibamen roams the fields, ready to ambush the survivors. After some time escaping these green creatures, a powerful Saiyan takes the lead in the chase.

name: Shape
description: "Shape" is an exciting story game that challenges players with intriguing puzzles. You'll delve into the life of a triangle living in a world dominated by squares. As you explore the triangle's inner world and uncover its true identity, you'll piece together the mysteries of its past. Every shape you discover brings you one step closer to understanding the triangle's journey and the emotions of being cast out of the norm.

name: Pinball FX: My Little Pony Pinball
description: Visit Twilight Sparkle and her friends as they begin preparations for the largest party Equestria has ever seen! Play everypony's mane mode to start the Wizard Mode, and lock balls into the Tree of Harmony for a spectacular 6-ball multiball!

name: Pinball FX: Grimm Tales
description: Surviving your own fairy tale, brave knight, requires first reliving seven of the Brothers Grimm's most classic stories. Find the seven dwarfs, awaken Sleeping Beauty, protect Little Red Riding Hood, escort Cinderella, and more. My, what big jackpots you have!

name: Pinball FX: Indiana Jones - The Pinball Adventure
description: Relive iconic scenes from the movies in Indiana Jones: The Pinball Adventure, the 1993 Williams classic. Escape Castle Brunwald, feed your pinballs to the mysterious Idol, and brave the Path of Adventure.

name: Pinball FX: Jurassic World️ Pinball
description: With one pinball table based on Jurassic World and two more inspired by Jurassic Park, you know what that means - Life found a way!

name: Pinball FX: Universal Monsters Pack
description: Two scarily authentic tables based on the Universal Monsters—Monster Bash and Creature from the Black Lagoon! Play in their perfectly simulated original form or as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

name: Merged Gravity Redux
description: Welcome to the space station 02, where it's reactor has entered critical state and the gravity manipulator ball is the only one who can enter it's core and fix the problem from inside. Enjoy 20 levels of fun and difficult platforming challenges, with gravity limits!

name: Trans Goetia
description:
Trans Goetia is a 18+ gender euphoric gay little adventure of trans girl named Circe losing her brain cells from dealing with the mischief making demon Fufu.

Circe gets introduced to the world of magic in exchange of being pestered as she gains squishy softness at a rate regular hormone therapy could never provide! Surely there are no demonic downsides!

This naughty story will be an episodic release, working towards a game where the player gets to nudge Circe towards specific kinks and consequences while even getting to help her decide what her ideal body will be.

name: Pinball FX: Garfield Pinball
description: Feast your way through mounds of lasagna to score big in Garfield Pinball! Dig up bones with Odie, woo Arlene, fight the alarm clock, and find Pooky the teddy bear to reach Feast Frenzy, all for a perfect feline day of eating and sleeping.

name: Pinball FX: Gearbox Pinball
description: Travel to distant words, prove your honor and cunning on 3 amazing tables of the Gearbox Pinball Pack. Includes Homeworld: Journey to Hiigara Pinball, Borderlands: Vault Hunter Pinball, Brothers in Arms: Win the War Pinball.

name: Pinball FX: Peanuts' Snoopy Pinball
description:
Join Snoopy, Woodstock, Charlie Brown, and the rest of the Peanuts gang on their adventures.
Shoot that jackpot, Charlie Brown. Play Peanuts' Snoopy Pinball!

name: Pinball FX: Secrets and Shadows Pack
description: Delve into the shadows of the big city, explore secret tombs and hunt for treasure in the newest Zen Original Pack. Hone your pinball skills with updated graphics, gorgeous digital displays replacing the Dot Matrix and climb to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball Collection 1
description:
Marvel Pinball Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- Captain America
- Doctor Strange
- Fantastic Four
- Iron Man
- Spider-Man
- Blade
- Wolverine
- Ghost Rider
- Thor
- X-Men
- Moon Knight

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball Collection 1
description:
Star Wars Pinball Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- Star Wars: Episode V: - The Empire Strikes Back
- Star Wars: The Clone Wars
- Boba Fett
- Darth Vader
- Star Wars: Episode VI: - Return of the Jedi
- Star Wars: Starfighter Assault
- Han Solo
- Droids
- Star Wars: Episode IV: - A New Hope
- Star Wars Pinball: Masters of the Force

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball Collection 2
description:
Star Wars Pinball Collection 2 brings the following tables:

- Star Wars Pinball: The Force Awakens
- Star Wars Pinball: Might of the First Order
- Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi
- Star Wars Pinball: Ahch-To Island
- Star Wars Pinball: Solo
- Star Wars Pinball: Calrissian Chronicles
- Star Wars Pinball: Battle of Mimban
- Star Wars Pinball: Rogue One
- Star Wars Rebels

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Thrill of the Hunt
description: Two great tables! Whether it's for bounties in The Mandalorian or for Star Wars toy nostalgia in classic collectibles, the hunt is on.

name: Pinball FX: The Machine - Bride of Pin Bot️
description: Here comes the Bride! Awaken the Machine by activating her vocal circuits and eyes. Or go even further and bring her to life! A legendary table from the PIN-BOT trilogy.

name: Pinball FX: Universal Classics Pinball
description: Universal Classics Pinball combines three captivating tables based on the blockbuster films Jaws, the Back to the Future trilogy, and E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Collection 1
description:
Williams Pinball Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- The Getaway: High Speed II
- Junk Yard
- Medieval Madness
- Black Rose
- Attack from Mars
- Party Zone
- Theatre of Magic
- Safe Cracker
- The Champion Pub
- White Water
- Red & Ted's Road Show
- Hurricane

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Collection 2
description:
Williams Pinball Collection 2 brings the following tables:

- White Water
- Red and Ted's Road Show
- Hurricane
- Cirqus Voltaire
- Tales of the Arabian Nights
- No Good Gofers
- Funhouse
- Space Station
- Dr. Dude and his Excellent Ray

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Swords of Fury
description: Unleash the fury of this 1988 solid state classic! Join the legendary Lion Man and prove your might! All in a world of sword and sorcery full of heroes, villains, and mythical monsters.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - The Addams Family
description: They're creepy and they're kooky, mysterious and spooky! Join The Addams Family in the classic, bestselling pinball adventure of all time.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - World Cup Soccer
description: Travel the United States and work your way up to the finals to be named World Champion! Juggle and dribble your ball, take aim, and score to pave your way to victory.

name: Pinball FX: World War Z Pinball
description: Outlive the dead to climb the leaderboards! The zombie horde forced your group to hide and you are now stuck in the overrun Central Mall. Score big and roll through hordes of Zeke to help the survivors escape this forsaken place.

name: Pinball FX: Zen Originals Collection 1
description:
Zen Originals Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- CastleStorm
- Secrets of the Deep
- Rome
- Biolab
- Pasha
- Son of Zeus
- Adventure Land

name: Drop Dead: The Cabin
description:
The Cabin is an intense and challenging game. Are you among the few that will survive? Gather supplies, arm up, and fight off waves of the walking dead that have escaped from an evil lab experiment. We expect you to die - a lot, each time you fall, you will earn XP to upgrade your character and weapons, making you stronger and bringing you one step closer to beating the game. Whether you play co-op or brave the horrors of hell solo - Fight with a blade, bat or a variety of guns, power up and become a pro monster slayer.

Can you hold off the horde before they breach the Cabin? Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Pinball FX: Wrath of the Elder Gods
description: The end is nigh! Face the horror of the Elder Gods on this table packed with the unspeakable. Try to escape with your sanity...

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 8
description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 Vocaloid songs, navigators, and avatars!

This pncludes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
- Colorful Marine Snow / Carlos Hakamada Saize P
- SnowMix♪ / marasy
- EgoRock / Three
- Reincarnation Apple / PinocchioP
- Hare wo matsu / Orangestar
- Nyanyanyanyanyanyanya! / DaniwellP
- Torinokocity / 40mP
- PaⅢ.SENSATION / Yunosuke
- Paradichlorobenzene / Garuna(OwataP)
- ???(Secret)

■Navigator
- Snow Miku (SNOW MIKU 2022) *with voice
- Snow Miku (SNOW MIKU 2023) *with voice

■Avatar
- Snow Miku (2D, SNOW MIKU 2022)
- Rabbit Yukine(2D, SNOW MIKU 2022)
- Snow Miku (2D, SNOW MIKU 2023)
- Rabbit Yukine(2D, SNOW MIKU 2023)

name: Z World Zombie: Death War
description:
Z World Zombie Death War is the ultimate 2D game in zombie survival.
Caught in the midst of an epic zombie outbreak in an unknown city, your only thought is: Survive!
In this game, players are tasked with fighting off a zombie invasion and reaching the subway to escape the city.

name: Nature Puzzle
description:
Nature Puzzle is here!

Play various stages! Try different approaches! Choose and win different puzzle stages alone or with friends!

name: Psychophonies: What Ghosts Say
description: Do you want to escape from the ghosts? You'll have to answer all their questions correctly, only then will you be able to save yourself. Will you be able to remember all your answers?

name: Fisher Online: China
description: The prototype for this lake was the Lake Xihu 29 species of inhabitants, of which 12 are found only at this locatio AI-map generation, 8 kilometers of coastline, 2.4 sq. km of water area, three game zones: channels, shallow waters, deep water.

name: One Piece Odyssey: Traveling Outfit Set
description: Includes Energy Apple x 10, Excite Apple x 10, Golden Jelly x 3, 100,000 Berries, and Traveling Outfit Set for Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, Usopp, Nami, Chopper, and Robin.

name: TerraTech: Prospector Edition
description: Explore, build, craft and battle to become the ultimate planetary prospector.

name: THZ
description: THZ is an arcade style top-down shooter with an emphasis on the greatest substance known to man. It's pretty dope.

name: Kanji Islands
description: Come to Kanji Islands and learn all the Kanjis and vocabulary necessary to become a proficient Japanese reader!

name: MiniBob
description: MiniBob is a 2D side view puzzle game, focused on exploring the enviroment, and getting to know the characters. Almost every object has something to tell, some times nothing important, but other times…

name: Inky & Blinky
description: Join Inky & Blinky and all their friends in this addictive little puzzle game where your goal is to get Blinky back to Inky.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Amtrak P40DC Loco
description: Through the craftsmanship of accomplished developer DTM, the original version of the stylish Genesis diesel - the P40DC (also often called the Dash 8-40BP) comes to Train Simulator Classic along with an all-new complete Amtrak Superliner consist!

name: Forklift Extreme: Impound Lot
description: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

name: Party Party Time: Party Harder & Party Fever Pack
description:
Party on!
The Party Fever Pack and Party Harder Pack are now available as a downloadable content bundle!

name: Party Party Time: Party Fever Pack
description: The party's just getting started! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Get ready for Party Fever, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand new minigames! Invite your friends and keep the party going!

name: Stack Tower
description: Are you ready to start greatest building the biggest tower building of the city in this Stack Tower Up 3D Builder Simulator Don't Crash game?

name: Party Party Time + Special Packs
description:
A party game with simple controls anyone can enjoy!
Pass around the Joy-Con and play with up to six players!
Experience a whole variety of intuitive, easy-to-play minigames.
Try to find your new favorite!

Pump up the party with the Party Fever Pack and Party Harder Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time!

name: Arcade Archives: Grobda
description: A colosseum for laser battles!

name: Anime vs. Evil: Apocalypse
description: In Anime vs. Evil you will fight the monsters that take over the whole world by mystical polygonal magic. Find the survivors, look for the supplies, beat the story mode and finally finish with this mess!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Festival of Friendship
description: The Update 3 for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings Mirabel (from Encanto) and Olaf (from Frozen) to the Valley and unravels the mysteries from the Frosted Heights biome. Some quality-of-life improvements and a Star Path inspired by Disney's 100th anniversary is also part of the update.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Forests
description: In glade and glen, copse and clearing, strange life forms live amongst the trees. The forests are home to countless flora and fauna that even the elves have yet to discover.

name: The Dwarf Kingdom: Magic World of War vs Orks and Dragon
description: An ancient evil has awakened. Are you strong enough to resist it?

name: Shadow Warrior 3: Definitive Edition
description: Take an adrenaline-fueled journey through a mythical Japanese realm in the Definitive Edition of Shadow Warrior 3, packed with new features, and enjoy an ultraviolent blend of fast-paced gunplay, razor-sharp melee combat, and spectacular free-running movement.

name: Sniper Strike 3D
description: Are you ready to immerse yourself in a fast-paced first-person shooter? Sniper Strike 3D is an amazing story game where you have to fight against a lot of villains, save innocent people and bring justice.

name: Fabled Lands: Lords of the Rising Sun
description: The Lords of the Rising Sun rule the exotic kingdom of Akatsurai, but rival warrior clans constantly seek to overthrow them. Will you spy for the Shogun? Make your fortune as a paid assassin? Or become one of the Sovereign's knights in your pursuit of glory and power?

name: The Abyss
description: "Everlasting night. Shadowed crescent, red moon runs. Watch the sleeping sun." -The White Crown Traverse throughout Mondreich, Learn its secrets, and free yourself from the chains of power and madness.

name: Soul Knight: The Forest of Spirits
description: A lone knight is lost in an enigmatic cave, now he must rely on his unshakable soul to face unknown challenges and uncover secrets in this journey of cunning and bravery. Your mission is to find the way out facing the darkness, avoiding obstacles and finding solutions to the challenges.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many cats and wool as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: A Symmetric Escape
description: A Symmetric Escape is a 3d puzzle exploration game where in order to escape you must solve isolated and environmental puzzles about... well... symmetry!

name: Misremembered Memories
description: A retro styled Len'en fangame inspired by the Japanese PC-98 Touhou Project games. Enjoy a nostalgic shoot-'em-up experience with faithful graphics and music without the hang-ups of outdated hardware.

name: Web or Dead
description: Be a spider battling to survive in this challenging platformer. Swing, leap and glide as you race to stay ahead of the rising lava but take care, there are many perils waiting in the deep!

name: Soul Taker
description: Win your way out of Hell by Playing the CardGame SoulTaker. A Fun Card Game With a Strong Relaxing Atmosphere and Anime Like Visuals, combined with a Cute Card Dealer From Hell.

name: Multiplayer Knights
description: Multiplayer Knight - Bad Dudes are attacking the Kingdom and a Dark Plague is ravaging the lands. King Archor has asked You and the Knights of the ring table to save us all !

name: Fantasy World Souls
description: What if we animate all the RPG Maker sprites and put them in an MMO, and it's still monster breeding style? This is the purpose of this game.

name: Hopping Girl Kohane EX
description:
Hopping Girl Kohane EX is an action puzzle game and players control Pogo Stick and aim for the goal in this action puzzle game.

The game is easy to operate with a single thumb, yet offers a hard-hitting, authentic action experience. The key to the game is the mysterious stamps with various effects. Step on the stamps skillfully and aim for a high score!

name: Montezuma's Revenge: 8-Bit Edition
description: You play as a treasure hunter named Panama Joe, whose goal is to find an ancient treasure hidden by Aztec warrior deep inside catacombs. But beware, the catacombs are a large maze inhabited by monsters. Bouncing and rolling skulls, dancing spiders, disappearing and re-appearing chains and tons of fire await you. You'll have to find many keys and unlock doors in order to reach your goal.

name: Beep's Escape
description: Play as Beep, a brave yet cavalier robot who is on a mission to escape from the strange tech facility that he and his fellow bots are being held captive in. Using just your wits and the items you find around you, will you help Beep find a route to safety?

name: Field of Glory II: Swifter than Eagles
description: Smite your foes with bow and spear as you lead your mighty chariots to glorious victory. Swifter than Eagles extends Field of Glory II backwards to the dawn of “civilised” warfare, covering the period from 2500-681 BC.

name: Overrun Survivors
description: Overrun Survivors is a fast-paced action roguelite game that throws players into the middle of hordes of aliens and asks them to fight tooth and nail in order to survive. Play through different alien planets and feel powerful knowing that you're the only one who can save the day!

name: Pinball FX: DreamWorks Pinball
description: Earn jackpots with the DreamWorks Pinball Pack on tables inspired by hot brands from DreamWorks Animation's Trolls, Kung Fu Panda, How to Train Your Dragon.

name: Wild Hearts: Karakuri Edition
description: Wild Hearts is a twist on the hunting genre where technology gives you a fighting chance against giant nature-infused beasts.

name: Hot and Lovely: Charm
description: You can check the numbers by clicking on the cards in the game. When two cards with the same number are opened at the same time, the cards will disappear, and when all the cards are eliminated, the level is successfully passed.

name: The Moon Hell
description: The Moon Hell is a very difficult third-person action RPG set in a fantasy mood in all game elements: sound, levels, light, atmosphere and other.

name: Horde Hunters
description: Horde Hunters is a challenging horde survival rogue-lite that plays like a twin stick shooter. Explore procedurally generated maps to collect resources and use weapons, abilities, and items to slay thousands of monsters all in about 15 minutes.

name: The Legend of Gwen
description: Join this amazing magical adventure and help Gwen restore the moons! The legend of Gwen is a hardcore platform game, with a retro style, where the objective is to get all the stars in each level, but the real question is... can you do it?

name: Towa Tsugai
description: Towa Tsugai is an original "couple raising" RPG for smartphones releasing in Japan with character designs by Yukisame.

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Premium Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This edition includes the 385 tracks in the Theatrhythm Final Bar Line core game and adds 27 “special music tracks,” plus the 90 tracks from popular Square Enix games included in Season Passes 1, 2 and 3 for the ultimate Square Enix music experience. There is an astounding total of 502 tracks to enjoy!

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This edition includes the 385 tracks in the Theatrhythm Final Bar Line core game and adds 27 “special music tracks” plus the 30 tracks from popular Square Enix games included in Season Pass 1 for a stunning 442 tracks to enjoy.

name: Wild Hearts
description: Prepare for an epic adventure set in a fantasy world inspired by feudal Japan. Developed by Omega Force, the Japanese studio behind Dynasty Warriors, in partnership with Electronic Arts.

name: Theatrhythm Final Bar Line
description: Theatrhythm Final Bar Line is a game in the Final Fantasy musical spin-off series, packed with 385 music tracks from across the whole Final Fantasy series.

name: Dust & Neon
description: Dust & Neon pits a single mech-enhanced cowboy against an army of robots in this fast-paced, Roguelite Action RPG twin-stick shooter, set in a futuristic Wild West.

name: 9 Childs Street
description: This is a first-person indie horror game. In 9 Childs Street you will find the terrifying atmosphere of a recently abandoned house, and its captive inhabitants, through the eyes of a curious little boy in a red cap.

name: Loretta
description:
Loretta is a psychological thriller that would make the player an accessory to the heroine’s crimes and would lead her through a self-crafted nightmare. This story is about a woman, dealing with betrayal, her husband’s infidelity, relationship problems and the difficult social situation of the 1940s.

Conceptually and aesthetically, the game is inspired by the American art of the twentieth century, the works of Andrew Wyeth and Edward Hopper, film noir of the 40s to 50s, thrillers by Alfred Hitchcock, the Philip Ridley movie The Reflecting Skin, the books 1922 by Stephen King and Lolita by Vladimir Nabokov.

name: Mortal Meal
description: Play as an untethered spirit, collecting fragments of your past while fleeing a cryptic force looking to consume your soul. Explore and survive an increasingly nightmarish world. Who are you? How will you avoid the harvest of your soul? What will you uncover with the time you have left?

name: The Tales of Bayun
description: Can a flat world resting on the backs of three demon bears live in peace? Of course not! Immerse yourself in the universe of the dark Slavic legends, explore the characters' stories and make difficult choices that affect the course of events. Bayun the Cat will help you. If you're lucky, that is.

name: Lucie's Potager
description: Follow the tale of Lucie and her shop as she chases her dream of growing exotic plants in this shopkeeping RPG!

name: Dreams in the Witch House
description: Dreams in the Witch House is an open world horror adventure game, where you guide Walter Gilman, as he prepares to face the dreaded May-Eve witch ritual in the legend-haunted city of Arkham. Choose your own approach and reveal the secret of the Witch House before it's too late.

name: Raid on Taihoku
description: Raid On Taihoku is an adventure game with the backdrop of WW2 Taiwan. By controlling the characters avoiding the heavy bombardments from the sky, you will pass through different danger and safe zones. Through the game progress, you will experience the struggles of human nature and cruelty of war.

name: Happy Mining
description: Discover a colorful world filled with resources in a single player mining adventure. Mine resources and expand your productions to earn even more gold.

name: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies
description: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies is the next horror and survival sequel/prequel to- White Day: A Labyrinth Named School.

name: Knights of Braveland
description: Hack and slash villains with your friends. An infinitely replayable series of quests - unlock new events, heroes, equipment and defeat bosses in the end of each unique run.

name: Cooperative Chess
description: Throw off the shackles of competition and play cooperative chess with friends instead! Can you meld minds and thwart everything thrown in your way to complete a totally perfectly normal game of chess?

name: Elderand
description: Experience a Lovecraftian inspired story-driven action RPG game with skill-based combat. Explore and Fight in a dreadful world rich in treasures and deadly creatures. Elderand is a love letter to Castlevania with modern elements. Make your own path as you unveil the darkness.

name: The Last Shot
description: An adventurous engineer, a diesel-punk world divided by endless conflict, and a whole lot of colossal guns. Sounds like a good time! With massive war machines threatening your home, will you be the one small cog that brings it all to a halt?

name: Rooftop Renegade
description: Blaze through challenging levels in rapid action-platformer Rooftop Renegade. Dodge hazards to evade pursuit using parkour skills and powerful abilities. Race through solo challenges, generated levels and chaotic local multiplayer!

name: Cities: Skylines - Remastered: Industries
description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines Remastered - Campus
description: Back to school! In Cities: Skylines - Campus, university life abounds with new area types for any sort of student - Trade School, Liberal Arts and University. Increase the reputation of your campus by attracting students and creating Academic Works to unlock new buildings. Build five types of varsity sports arenas and nine unique faculties, employ seven new policies, earn seven new achievements and take on five new maps! Campus takes higher education to new heights with everything you need to graduate magna cum laude.

name: Cities: Skylines - Remastered: Sunset Harbor
description: Sin descripción

name: Ten Thousand Immortals
description: "Ten Thousand Immortals" is a game of cultivating immortals in the national style. It is very easy to play. The original script of 100000 characters is an adventure in the endless world of cultivating immortals, presenting a real world of cultivating immortals for you!

name: Monkey-catching Game
description: Is Monkey cheating on Banana? Investigate and take pictures to find out.

name: Tell me tonight was real
description: A game about two friends with benefits, a vampire and a human going on a impromptu date and realizing they are in love.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 22
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 22 has arrived with this update.

name: Refinery Complex
description: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. Mouselook is recommended, but not required.

name: Hacking Simulator
description:
Prove your knowledge in web technology, programming and hacking.

There are a certain number of levels. You start at level 1. To reach the next level, a puzzle is given on the level 1 page. This can be hidden clues in the source code of the web page, some header information, a pixel on the web page, an image what is coded with text, etc... the possibilities are endless.

name: Mr Rabbit's Cambridge: Point and Click Adventure
description: Discover an imagery Cambridge in this dynamic point and click adventure game. Find Mr Rabbit before The SS P320 leaves!

name: Sleeping Alone
description: Sleeping Alone is a short retro PSX-style indie horror game.

name: Match Master
description: Learn how to make pairs with us. Game for your child in any age.

name: Grip on Reality: Bound and Forgotten
description: Play as the Bound God, a giant creature who wreaks havoc on the enemy through terrifying swipes of his claws and great bursts of fire.

name: Grip on Reality: Endless Night
description: Play as the Nightmare Stalker, a void realm assassin focusing on speed and precision to kill its enemies and unleash its power of the endless night.

name: SkyIsland
description: "SkyIsland" is made by a group of students in a college, quarter-view action-adventure game. Enjoy the wonderful world and beautiful environments as you help the protagonist, Pino, fix his broken plane and defeat monsters to return home safely.

name: Cities: Skylines - Remastered
description: Cities: Skylines - Remastered puts you in charge of a growing city, from the ground-breaking of its first streets to the ever-changing needs of thousands of citizens. Design, build, and manage the city of your dreams, from public services to civic policies, and challenge yourself to grow from a simple town to a bustling metropolitan hub.

name: I'm on Merrymaking Watch
description: A short, Christmas themed game where you scan through security camera feeds for anything Christmas related. If you see anything festivous, be they Christmas ornaments, gifts, or perhaps even Santa himself, report them immediately!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train DB/DR Auxiliary Train
description: The standard DR auxiliary train developed and built by the Deutsche Reichsbahn (DR) between 1973 and 1979, is mainly referred to as the Einheitshilfszug (EHZ). The train is set of locomotive-hauled rail vehicles for technical assistance in the event of operational disruptions or railroad accidents.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train DB/DR Auxiliary Train
description: The standard DR auxiliary train developed and built by the Deutsche Reichsbahn (DR) between 1973 and 1979, is mainly referred to as the Einheitshilfszug (EHZ). The train is set of locomotive-hauled rail vehicles for technical assistance in the event of operational disruptions or railroad accidents.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train DB/DR Auxiliary Train
description: The standard DR auxiliary train developed and built by the Deutsche Reichsbahn (DR) between 1973 and 1979, is mainly referred to as the Einheitshilfszug (EHZ). The train is set of locomotive-hauled rail vehicles for technical assistance in the event of operational disruptions or railroad accidents.

name: Another Pokémon Game
description: Another Pokémon Game is another Pokémon game.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Underwater
description: Dive into the Marvels of Underwater Wonders!

name: Launcher Heroes
description: Launcher Heroes is a tactical, artillery, party game where you try to knock your opponents off the world. Use an assortment of items such as bombs, rockets, and jetpacks to help you navigate and destroy the terrain.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: DLC Wave 3
description:
Challenge Battle mode against difficult enemies:
- Archsage's Gauntlet

A new hero character and accompanying quests:
- Masha
- New character outfits

name: Sleight of Hand: Dominion
description: A realm torn by war. Muster an army and combat your enemies on the battlefield in this epic card game. Play your hand right and claim your spoils of war.

name: First Time in Hawaii
description: The sun, the sea — and a wedding in peril!?

name: MathCar
description: In MathCar, players can race against each other or themselves by using math problem-solving skills to control their car. This cross-platform game combines competitive racing with math education, making it an engaging and effective way for kids and adults alike to improve their math fact proficiency.

name: Jump Tale
description: Jump Tail is a simple 2D Platformer with 10 different playable “Characters”. It's your Goal to finish all the 110 Levels with the best possible time and the least possible deaths.

name: Animal Kingdom
description: Welcome to Animal Kingdom, a hidden animal game where you collect pawprints, cameras and coins while searching animals in fantastic locations! With 3 game modes and trivias between the chapters, Animal Kingdom will provide hours of fun for Hidden Object fans in surreal settings!

name: Sky High Games Horror Collection
description: This is The Sky High Games Horror Collection. With this collection you will have 5 survival horror games to choose from. That can be played in any order.

name: Paranormal Cleanup
description: Paranormal Cleanup is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. This is no ordinary clean-up job. You are employees of a cleaning company tasked with cleaning up a haunted house. Take out the trash, but don't get caught by the ghosts that haunt the place!

name: Minibots TD
description: It's defense time! Arrange your forces against the invading Robotic tribe called the Kaids. Choose your arsenal and place them wisely for excellent road defense. Prove your defenses against challenging enemies.

name: Mega Sudoku: Binary & Suguru
description: Experience three totally different number puzzles in one package with 400 puzzles for you to solve. Start with the easy puzzles and increase the difficulty as you become a Mega Sudoku master! All levels have hint button which will give a number on a random place and a reset button.

name: Crazy Hill Racing
description: You should hurry! You're running out of gas and you're still far from home.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 02
description:
Gear up for Season 02 in Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty Warzone 2.0 and have you and your squad be victorious when the mist clears.
Resurgence Mode returns on a new battleground in Warzone 2.0 starting in Season 02.

name: W.A.R.P.
description:
3 Game Modes.
Perfect for quick games at all times.
More than 140 stages.

name: Plan B: Terraform
description: Manage a newly discovered planet, contemplate your world evolve and grow your population. Mine resources, process and transport them to the cities to keep colonizing. Your mission is to terraform your planet to make it inhabitable: warm up the atmosphere, form rivers, oceans and grow forests.

name: Pantazil
description: The Pantazil is a 2D exploration and platform game with a pixel art style.

name: Protect Harem City
description: Protect Harem City is a strategy tower defense game where you are the tower that will protect the city! Arm yourself with lots of weapons and skills and be ready to be the defender of Harem. Are you ready to appease everyone's lust?

name: Keiko-san (47) my co-worker, is a single mother
description: An adult visual novel game with full animation, tells the story of a widowed woman named "Tanaka-Keiko". she was abandoned by her husband, and her daughter chose to follow him. because of economic problems, Keiko has to work at a mini market, and met a young man named Fujimoto-Arata.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport New Chitose - RJCC
description:
This product (ATC4: Airport New Chitose [RJCC]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of New Chitose Airport and the adjacent Chitose Air Base in Chitose, Hokkaido, Japan.

name: Witch Guild Survivor
description: Witch Guild Survivor is a fun horde roguelite game where you play as a witch that must survive from the monsters using your poweful spells! Collect white orbs and upgrade your magic spells. Choose a combination of various elements to generate synergies between them in each run

name: Ikki Unite
description: With up to 16 players, this is roguelike action, but united! "You can't riot with just one or two people!"The legendary "bad game" that once had people scoffing is back, and this time it's time to unite! This is roguelike action…but united!

name: Lady of Dreams
description: Lady of Dreams is an action rhythm bagel, the actions of which take place in a dream, where music and thoughts merged in one harmony. The environment and missions are created based on your chosen favorite composition. With each completed stage, the game will change its rules…

name: Home by the River
description: Transform your polluted world into a beautiful one! Plant crops and harvest them to earn income. Make computer games to earn income! Unlock construction tiles as you level up, look after your hunger, energy, and spirit, build your home and admire what you have made.

name: Taolu
description: Becoming a kung fu master has never been that much fun! In Taolu you can train your martial arts skills respecting the essence of the real kung fu, expanded with the wonder of a VR game. Master curated sets of choreographed movements using a realistic wooden dummy.

name: Otherside
description:
A Strange New World
We set out to build the Otherside with one thing in mind: the metaverse should be anything but boring.

The world should be dynamic, steeped in narrative, and your actions should hold consequence.

Step into the Otherside, where the normal rules do not apply.

Where you end up is up to chance. Where you go is up to you.

Otherside is a gamified, interoperable metaverse currently under development. The game blends mechanics from massively multiplayer online role playing games (MMORPGs) and web3-enabled virtual worlds.

name: The Wraith of the Galaxy
description: The Wraith of the Galaxy is a third-person space combat game.

name: The Last Starship
description: Introversion Software, the indie legends behind Prison Architect, Darwinia, DEFCON and Uplink, present to you the broken, unfinished and bug filled Alpha of The Last Starship. Pick a ship hull, kit her out with engines, life-support, sensors and rail guns and start your galactic adventure!

name: Tower Escape
description: Escape the tower by summoning minions and guiding them to the exit! Tower Escape is a "Reverse Tower Defense" game where you guide a snake through a maze, then your minions follow it as they pick up treasure and keys to the next level.

name: Cube Conflict
description: Cube Conflict is a free and open-source FPS where smileys are at war without mercy. If you see a Ninja firing a nuclear missile at a Priest with a GAU-8 in power armor, it's totally normal in this game!

name: Pharaoh: A New Era
description: A remake of the 1999 strategy game Pharaoh and its expansion Cleopatra: Queen of the Nile.

name: Operation: Harsh Doorstop
description: Operation: Harsh Doorstop is a free, community developed, tactical shooter. Developed by the studio Drakeling Labs in partnership with MicroProse Software, Inc. Built using the OHDCore framework for Unreal Engine 4.

name: Temple Of Snek
description:
A snaky tile-based puzzle dungeon adventure. Defend the temple, monch the infidels, and grow and grow and grow...
Play as a giant snake in an inter-coiled tile-based puzzle dungeon. Explore, master puzzle mechanics and special abilities, and uncover secrets... all is not what it seems in the Temple of Snek.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Valentine's Weapon Skin Pack
description: Celebrate Valentine’s Day by giving your M1911 the look of love with this free Cherry Hunter Weapon Skin. Download now for FREE to share the love.

name: Pokemomcore
description: Travel through Pallet Town and Viridian Town after an anti-capitalist and anti-speciesist revolution! Red, Blue, Green and Yellow have fought to emancipate Kanto from the grip of the Pokémon League and its alienating power over the people. And you, you play as GAMIN Lesli who has to pick up a package for their MOM so she can make pottery this weekend with her friends! Will you arrive in time to get the package and will there be any rhubarb pie left?

name: Jomey
description: A game about Jomey, a little green character with a dream so grand it could span the entire sky. Help him take a school project further than he could ever imagine by wielding all kinds of sweet treats against his enemies and building an UNSTOPPABLE team of WINNERS.

name: MyGF: Another
description: A brand new game in the world of 'My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into!' Discover new sides to the cast and enjoy the story from different perspectives.

name: Mario Royale Deluxe
description:
An unofficial remake of Mario Royale.

It was cancelled in favor of in favor of Mario Royale Legacy's development, and so it was made Open Source,

name: Parfum Nostalgique
description: Parfum Nostalgique is a heartfelt tale about the people who change us, for better and for worse. From betrayal to unconditional love, from regret to hope… see the drama unfold between exes and lovers, old friends and new, when you dive into this kinetic visual novel dram-com series. With delicate vintage shoujo-inspired art, original soundtrack, and a diverse cast of voice actors, Parfum Nostalgique is a lovingly handmade passion project packaged with sweets and scented with roses by sole developer Prince Rosalium for your reading pleasure.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Angel's Gear
description:
A unique combat system - unconventional movement that rewards precise aiming and mastery over strategy, patience, and quick thinking.
KO enemies with melee attacks, stomp them for ammunition, use that newfound ammo to shred through enemies with a variety of interesting bullet types.

name: Code: Dead Ends
description: A survival themed otome game.

name: Ballz Deep
description: Ballz Spawn at the top of your screen and fall to the end. There are obstacles in the way and it's up to you to upgrade to make the map easier!

name: The Lonely League
description: The Lonely League is a comic book style superhero tactical fangame RPG with Superman, Batman, Venom and John Lennon. It alternates between comic book cutscenes and tactical battles inspired by games like Shining Force and Final Fantasy Tactics. Battles are challenging and deeply tactical, and there are always multiple paths to victory, which often include not only attacking but also interacting with map objects and recruiting temporary characters. The story develops from common errands of an ordinary guy, slowly escalating to an epic journey with psychological and political undertones.

name: Illove dream
description: Illove dream (爱梦症) is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. You explore Aiko's dreams, who refuses to leave her room.

name: I Made This Game on a Shitty Chromebook
description: Thoughts and feelings, February 2023

name: My Extraordinary Girlfriend
description:
Life as a highschooler in the city is stressful enough, but your home also happens to be a hot spot for monsters and other supernatural occurrences. With gods, aliens, and monsters running around, you’re thankful you’re just an average guy… until you hear that the descendant of Hercules has been found. ‘Good for him,’ you say to yourself…

Things take a wild turn, however, when three girls suddenly transfer into your school and immediately begin asking for your hand in marriage! Isn’t it a bit too soon to think about stuff like that? Not for these three whimsical gals; the descendant of the goddess Athena, the daughter of a super villain, and an alien princess! You think this is all a joke, but these girls are persistent! ‘Average’ is no longer a word you can associate yourself with—not with all of the shenanigans you’re about to get tossed into!

name: HellFurnace
description: Go to save the world from HellFurnace. HellFurnace is a 2D boss rush game in which the protagonist, who has fallen into another world, defeats the boss. Avoid enemy attacks to collect beads and create weapons to defeat the boss.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Quest Set
description: Delve into the depth of the Labyrinth of Galleria with this DLC Bundle which includes three quests: Special Soul Pact Quest, Great Hat Quest, and Great Boots Quest.

name: Multiplayer Cowboys
description:
The Town is being taken over by Ghosts. Can You and Your Posse Survive ?

This is a Fast Paced RPG Survival game.

The game includes a Single & Multiplayer CO-OP system via Steam.
You can Invite Your Steam Friends with the ' + ' Icon on the Main Menu and Team Up!

name: Berry People
description: Berry People is a game where you take photos of as many berries as you can find! You can find these silly creatures hiding everywhere in the forest. Explore each area fully to discover all of its secrets! Take a breath of fresh air while relaxing in a field of flowers, climb a very tall hill or take your time and try to count all of the falling -- Wait is that a berry? Quickly! Take a picture!

name: Noobs Want to Live
description: Noobs Want to Live is a fast-paced roguelike featuring several characters and a large pool of skills to choose from (that synergize with one another, too!) Fight, kill, grow. Each run is a new chance to create a steamrolling build!

name: Chess Maiden
description: Introducing the ultimate chess experience - "Chess Maiden"!

name: Deluge: Sermon for the Dead
description: In the streets of Abbotsford, a girl daydreams of cataclysmic floods. Descend into the depths of her tempestuous sorrow. An interactive visual novel with psychological and lovecraftian undertones.

name: Space Game: Star We There Yet?
description: It’s an idle game! It’s a battle game! It’s a Space Game! Welcome to the ultimate interstellar road trip. Travel across the cosmos, collect rare and honorable crew, then use them to battle against friends and foes alike in this unique (and oddly addicting) adventure!

name: Apex Legends: Revelry
description:
To celebrate another anniversary of the Apex Games, Duardo Silva's throwing quite the party. But Mad Maggie never met a Syndicate event she didn't want to crash.
R.S.V.P. to the wildest party in Outlands history. It’s time to drop in and get legendary in Apex Legends: Revelry! New Team Deathmatch mode joins the Apex Games, and remastered Legend classes means everyone has a role to play. And with the new Nemesis rifle joining the Loadout, the big guns have officially arrived. The party don't start till you drop in!

name: Pool Ball Battle Royale
description: Control your own pool ball and try to knock your opponents into the holes in this action-packed game. Outmaneuver and defeat your opponents with strategy and quick reflexes to emerge victorious.

name: Drift City Underground
description: Drift City Underground is a car drifting game with 8 initial cars that can be unlocked in the Early Access in a open world map with car deep customization and skining. Briliant mechanics will make this game enjoyable and stunning graphics will settle for a AAA Indie game.

name: See You Later
description: There are so many things I want to do with the rest of my life. Like dreaming with you, laze around with you, look at the moon, eat rice with you, go on the biggest wedding trip to Antarctica, and most importantly - say goodbye to you.

name: Anyone There?
description: "Anyone there ?" is a first-person horror game. You are investigating a school where a Creature has been released. Scan the clues and find out his identity before he finds you.

name: Missing Hiker
description: Missing Hiker is a short indie horror game, where your brother Ethan went missing while hiking and you need to find him.

name: Parashotical Arktivibeatings
description: Celebrate 10 years of Paranautical Activity with ALL of Code Avarice's FPS innovations packed into a single wacky package! Navigate through procedural levels and collect iconic Paranautical Activity items to power yourself up as you murder your friends in an Arkshot-like PVP multiplayer frenzy!

name: TitTok Kitty: Pussy
description: TitTok Kitty: Pussy - Erotic Hentai Anime Puzzles. All 50 levels with Cats are replaced by levels with Anime Girls. 100% Free!

name: Polyrhythm Master
description: A music game in which you play visually represented, complex polyrhythms with surprisingly simple controls. Neither the difficulty nor the ease of existing music games exist here.

name: World Annihilation Operations Parts I-IV
description: Explore this set of 4 distinct short experimental games and experience impossible worlds filled with audiovisual and narrative contradictions.

name: The Pyramid of Bones
description: In The Pyramid of Bones you will have to kill as many mummies as you can, when feeling overwhelmed you must always extract through a door to keep your score. Become the greatest mummy slayer of them all!

name: Adventure's Calling
description: Adventure's Calling is a relaxing educational game that tests your geography skills by flying around the world in a house held up by balloons!

name: Clear the Space
description: Deal with a semi-intelligent cloud of asteroids which don't let your starship through. You have 7 ultra-hard projectiles and the ability to collect what remains after each destroyed asteroid. And djenty soundtrack will set just the right vibe.

name: Gemscape
description: Ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new levels, use boosters to continue your saga and become the last hope to save the Flying Islands and their magical inhabitants!

name: Nixxsz Castle
description: Nixxsz Castle is a classic 2D platformer. Inspired by the gold standard of action games from previous generations, Nixxsz Castle brings a new adventure with modern gameplay

name: Souls of Chronos
description: Classic JRPG + Action Combat System

name: Bazooka Cat: First Episode
description: Bazooka Cat is a lovingly crafted platform game inspired by the old school games of the 90s with new technologies.The game takes place in a sci-fi fictional world somewhere on the edge of the universe. The story tells about the difficult fate of the cat Lucky and the robotic assistant M.U.R

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Special Soul Pact Quest
description:
Unlocks a bonus quest. Once completed, you'll receive a soul pact as a reward.
The quest will appear under Request Memo once you unlock it.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Great Hat Quest
description:
Unlocks a bonus quest. Once completed, you'll receive a helm as a reward.
The quest will appear under Request Memo once you unlock it.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Great Boots Quest
description:
Unlocks a bonus quest. Once completed, you'll receive shoes as a reward.
The quest will appear under Request Memo once you unlock it.

name: Love Quest
description: Embark on a quest to find your sweetheart. Talk to girls, avoid those pesky trolls and play videogames. A dark comedy with a blend of environmental storytelling, stealth and 2d platforming.

name: Wanted: Dead - Collector's Edition
description: A physical copy of the game that comes in a steelbook case and collector's box along with CD soundtrack, artbook, magnet, and postcards.

name: Red Tape
description: Explore 9 levels of corporate hell as you fight to clear your name with the Devil and restore balance between Heaven and Hell.

name: Ski3
description: The unending, relaxing and somewhat harrowing experience of the classic 90's game in this 3D take on the old adventure.

name: TitTok Kitty
description: TitTok Kitty - Erotic Hentai Anime Puzzles. 100 unique puzzles! The goal of the player is to build pictures consisting of different elements.

name: Corgi Cove
description: Follow the adventure of Gizmo, a super smart puzzle-solving corgi!

name: Turbo Cat Fight
description: Turbo Cat Fight is an oddball pixel-perfect fighting game. Both players get to choose their loadouts and they fight it out! Challenge your friend to an ultimate showdown of an earthshaking fist trade!

name: First Bite: Bad Blood
description: An LGBTQ+ Vampiric Visual Novel. So you think you’re above the law because you’re undead and have perfect hair? Think again.

name: FFF
description: FFF is an idle merge game about friendship and love…and a microwave. Everything is entirely fictional and made up. It's not based on actual events or people. Due to poor content and ugly art style, the game should not be played by anyone… Maybe except you. You are special.
