name: D.U.C.K.: Dangerous Ultimate Cartridge Kidnapper
description: A group of ducklings finds a mysterious 100-in-1 cartridge and are now forced to play all the games to escape the insidious cartridge spirit! 100 microgames, fun and increasing difficulty—what more do you need for an interesting adventure?

name: Ten Dates
description:
Ten Dates is the sequel to the interactive rom-com, Five Dates. Misha, a millennial from London in search of that elusive in-person connection, tricks her best friend Ryan into going to a speed dating event with her. Each with their own five potential matches, Misha and Ryan must pluck up the courage and turn on the charm to date wildly different personalities.

Throughout the game, your choices and interactions will either strengthen or weaken your relationship with your date. Amidst a branching, multi-directional chain of conversation topics and deep-dive questions, Misha and Ryan are faced with ice-breaker games, awkward scenarios and unexpected truths. Will either find love?

name: Spy Bros.: Pipi & Bibi's DX
description: Those wacky gangsters are up to no good... Dodge them, plant the bombs and flee the building before it blows up!

name: Blanc
description: Blanc is an artistic cooperative adventure that follows the journey of a wolf cub and a fawn stranded in a vast, snowy wilderness. They must come together in an unlikely partnership to find their families.

name: Wanted: Dead
description: Wanted: Dead promises "spectacular melee combat and exciting gunplay," and is set in a "dark and dangerous version of science-fiction Hong Kong where you will need sharpened skills to survive."

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim 2
description: The apocalypse is in full swing! Date Elder Gods, win back the Dreamlands - and all of reality as you know it - in this cosmic horror-comedy RPG.

name: Painting Werther
description: Painting Werther is an interactive visual novel where all the visuals are living paintings, all the music are classics (with a twist) and the novel was written by Goethe (1774). The story tells the sorrows of Werther, a young man who fell so deeply in love that he was the first romantic.

name: Tony Slopes
description: Jump into the wonderful world of Tony Slopes and race a whole host of utterly ridiculous and outlandish vehicles down some of the most treacherous and unpredictable terrains. With a variety of fun-filled, themed races to compete on, multiple vehicles and headpieces to try out, Tony Slopes is bound to keep you and your friends entertained for hours on end!

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition Sketch Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Deception: Malicious Mall
description: Fan-game of Dark Deception.

name: Dire Decks
description: Craft the perfect deck to slay hordes of enemies.

name: Take Me or Leaf Me
description: Take Me or Leaf Me is the world’s first digital houseplant dating sim (as far as we can tell), inspired by other wacky dating sims and set in the Kinder World universe.

name: Blast Radius
description: Blast Radius is a fan add-on for the Apogee/3D Realms classic 1996 FPS Duke Nukem 3D by ck3d. Features a brand new episode of 15 maps as well as 40+ new types of alien scum.

name: 12 pm Break
description: Get ready to take your lunch break on Toonie Tuesday. Sometimes lunch breaks are longer, so this time it’s not going to be limited to 5 maps.

name: Join Tiles: Anatolian Game to Play
description: Join Tiles: Anatolian Game to Play is a puzzle game whose aim is to combine broken tiles. Our game, which offers a pleasant and fluent gameplay, contains the works of Anatolian Tile art of hundreds of years.

name: Mooshie's Kitchen
description:
Welcome to Mooshie’s Kitchen! Established and operating since April 20th, 1969.

Mooshie’s Kitchen is a short, first-person mascot horror game where you play as Todd, a chef at Mooshie’s Kitchen who is finishing up his day at the establishment.

Mooshie’s Kitchen has brought joy to all walks of life since April 20th, 1969! What could go wrong?

name: SIght
description: SIght is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a cyclops named Nakime and the goal of the game is to obtain the five Items (アイテム) scattered throughout each world to unlock one of two endings.

name: Meme Quiz
description: Meme quiz – a quiz type game about modern meme culture. Can you become a Meme Master?

name: Overwatch 2: Loverwatch - Love Never Dies
description: A totally real, totally non-canon dating sim hosted by Cupid Hanzo!

name: A Traveler to Unknown Thule
description: Adventure Game Traveling around Iceland.

name: Clay Soldiers: The Faithful
description: Generate extreme amounts of faith and use that faith to summon the strongest units in the game. Support you allies with powerful healers and blessers or convert your enemies to boost your faith production! Control the power archangel or wage war with an immortal chosen.

name: Clay Soldiers: The Immortals
description: Introducing the Immortal alliance! Part of the undead faction; these creatures are hard to kill! Nearly every unit has a chance to be revived after death! Includes a collection of monsters, vampires, and lynches. Raid your opponents with undead creatures and variants of the everyday zombie!

name: Clay Soldiers: The Raiders
description: Introducing the Raiders alliance! These barbarians plunder gold from every kill, start with a huge economy, and have a lot of cheap fast units at your disposal! combine their abilities and army with others of the same faction to create an unstoppable early game powerhouse!

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Brecken Bundle
description: Become a leader that uses a full array of parkour moves with Brecken's Bundle.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Rais Bundle
description: Don the Rais' Outfit, take pleasure in slicing your enemies (both human and Infected) with the Wolfclaw machete, and use the Rais' Paraglider skin to reside high above anyone else as only the true ruler should.

name: Nothing to Lose
description: A retro horror and adventure game.

name: Rebel Inc: Escalation - Dollars & Disasters
description: Rebel Inc.'s explosive new expansion! Survive an erupting volcano in Devil's Peak, burn through money with The Billionaire, enhance your tactics with new Special Advisors and explore exciting new Official Scenarios.

name: Last Dawn
description: Last Dawn is a short first-person atmospheric exploration game set in the year 2082. You will explore an open world map, hide from guards, and find a way to escape.

name: Crime Passional
description: You thought that after leaving that abusive relationship, your life would slowly start to improve, but a cold night in early 2006, the nightmare returned. Your ex-boyfriend came back and wants to take you with him, by force if necessary.

name: The Legend of Sword and Fairy 7: Dreamlike World
description: “Sword and Fairy 7” is an action role-playing game developed by Softstar Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. As the first DLC of the game, “Dreamlike World” is an extension of the original story, with new gameplay and mechanics designs. We'd like to bring a unique gaming experience to all the players.

name: School Flight Simulator
description: Welcome aboard dear travelers. The plane takes off in 10 minutes, please fasten your seat belts!

name: Dragon Abyss
description: Dragon Abyss is an exciting game in which you have to ride a dragon to conquer huge distances, dangerous enemies will stand in your way... The game is perfect for relaxing and having great fun.

name: Hentai Aim Trainer 2
description: Now you can train your aim with hentai girls. Enjoy and relax while shooting boobs!

name: Spring X Elixir
description: Spring X Elixir presents a modern alchemist girl named Wick Sugar, who stumbles upon a mysterious sixth Spring element besides the Five Elements when slaying evil spirits. Help her defeat the evil spirits, which have the Spring element, and enjoy the charm of Spring Horny Aphrodisiacs together!

name: Adam and Eve: Crossy River
description: Help Adam & Eve cross the river! Make sure they both don't drown or get bitten by giant crabs and other dangerous animals while making it safely to the other side!

name: Get in the Car, Loser!: The Fate of Another World
description: Every 976 years, the heavens pick one warrior to hear the calling and use the Sword of Fate to seal away the Machine Devil. Emily Harmless used to be an activist, a librarian, and a scholar... but she had to put that all aside when she was chosen as that warrior. Is there any hope for her to find peace in the burning ruins of her world after carrying out the heavens’ mission?

name: Comit Legends
description: Comit Legends is a remake of the first five Comit games, built from the ground up with a new engine. Replay Comit's fight against the evil space pirate Krater and the universe conquering leader of the Star Knights, Cosmo Knight.

name: Dr Livesey Rom and Death Edition
description: Gentlemen, from now on, rom and death means the same thing for you.

name: Perseus: Titan Slayer
description:
Perseus: Titan Slayer is an over-the-top hack and slash, rogue-like adventure that focuses on depth and branching choices which allow for multiple unique runs. Branching choices allow for custom runs and many opportunities to play again and try new builds. Wield a Sword, Dagger, Bow, or Katana, each with their own special abilities. Feel like a real Olympian and explore the secrets of each weapon.
Meet Zeus, Poseidon, Hermes, and many other Olympians and gain their legendary upgrades.
Hack and slash through hordes of enemies as you make your way into Tartarus on an epic journey to fight Hades and the Titans.
It doesn’t matter how you want to play this game or what style you want to use. A shopkeeper system allows players to make unique builds whether you want to be a Tank, Agile, DPS or even a double spell caster on your adventure.

name: Paranoia Place
description: Paranoia Place is a 2 player online co-op survival horror game. Together or alone, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty demonic killer.

name: Umbral Omen
description: Umbral Omen is a mystical puzzle game that generates a unique problem to decipher every time you play! Read the clues carefully in order to place the correct runes in the right spots and unravel the riddle of the Umbral Omen!

name: Opportunity: A Sugar Baby Story
description: Opportunity: A Sugar Baby Story is a warm, lighthearted erotic visual novel exploring what it means to rebuild and reinvent yourself against a backdrop of late-stage capitalism.

name: Super Mario 64 in SuperTux
description: Super Mario 64 in SuperTux is a modified version of SuperTux which incorporates Mario using his moveset from Super Mario 64 into SuperTux using libsm64.

name: Super Mario World Redone
description:
Super Mario World Redone is a hack that aims to create much nicer visuals for the original Super Mario World, while adding some new features, secrets and an all new encore mode!
The game also includes new custom music and lots of bugfixes for the original game.

As a bonus, there are four new levels for you to find, and they are very well hidden! Can you find them?

name: Super Mario World: Bowser's Kaizo Conspiracy
description: Sin descripción

name: Morior Invictus
description: Morior Invictus is a collaborative megawad for Doom II that contains 33 levels, made by the members of the Doomworld community, lead by forgettable pyromaniac. The project's goal was to emulate mapping tendencies of the 90's, but with a more modern approach

name: Reach To Neighbor House
description: Just a mini game about reaching neighbor's house with parkour.

name: Cut Strings
description:
Media that wants to stay lost.

A horror blogger stumbles upon a series of lost media finds that leads them to uncover the mystery of characters "escaping" from their source material.

name: Hand2Hand Project
description: The Hand2Hand project is a fighting game... of hands! Use everyday object in everyday places out of boredom in epic battles between... yourself.

name: Football 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Arcade" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: The Slothgate Experiment: Death's Door
description: welcome back to The Slothgate Experiment... Part 2 continues the story of the first slothgate. You are returned to slothgate, where a guard sabotages the rules, he is gonna help you escape, will you make it back and escape your traumas, or will you die in slothgate?

name: After
description: AF+ER is the story of a child finding himself in a dream world. One that is a perfect reflection of the real one, but with a grim secret. Somehow, these two worlds become almost seamlessly intertwined.

name: The Mistcaller
description: Mistcaller is a puzzle platformer inspired by games like Limbo. Fully hand-drawn, the uniquely artistic world encased within the mist is beautifully rendered. Explore a deep and rich narrative centered around an ongoing conflict between rival families and uncover Eve's place in it all.

name: TankLab
description: Operate the tank to fire bullets! Defeat your opponents and claim victory! Choose your favorite skill and conquer the field! A pop and simple shooting game.

name: Inside My Mind 2
description: A psychedelic platformer, each level of which is a step into the depths of the subconscious. Avoid the traps of the mind, find answers to questions and go through the path of personality transformation.

name: Amber Trail
description: Amber trail is a pixel art 2D side scrolling real time strategy mixed with hack'n slash action. Manage resources and defend your settlement from incoming enemies.

name: United Heist
description: Your group consists of the best two thieves money can buy. One day a client requested to take something unknown from the government. Now you can decide who stays back managing the intel and who is going into the facility to accomplish the task in this asynchronous coop puzzle game.

name: Saikoro Saiko: Memento Mori
description:
“Death is salvation. I'm sure she would want it too.”

Behind the scenes of Saikoro Saiko, the story of Saiko.
The fearsome yandere who knows everything, and what happened to her.

name: Hoshikage no Yakata Satsujin Jiken
description: Sin descripción

name: Antarctic Tales Enhanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Love At First Squeak
description:
Are you desperate for love this Valentine's week? Well head on down to the Rat Hole Nightclub and mix it up with some of Scythe's locals to find romance!

Have fun, fall in love, & remember to open up your heart, all the way. Rip it open! A brand new dating experience where you pursue romance at the hip Rat Hole nightclub. But on this night - vulnerability can be deadly!

name: Channel 7
description: Channel 7 is a single player game with psx era graphics. You are a camera man working for channel 7 news and you are on a journey to a mysterious town called Willowbrook.

name: The Spirit Stone
description: Oh no, you're dead! Luckily you can fix that if you get your hands on every piece of the Spirit Stone. This is a short adventure game.

name: A Circle of Charity
description: The fall semester at UofX, 2003. Two graduate students gather to speak with an angel girl. Meanwhile, the ties that bind three women tighten and twist. Only files remain. Trace your fingers around the circle carefully.

name: Hentai Series: Classic
description: Complete a puzzle to see the original picture, listen to the relaxing lofi and use 1 hand to play a game.

name: Lilith
description: Do you enjoy non-stop, high-intensity, combat while fighting hordes of enemies? Come play Lilith and find yourself engulfed in this experience!

name: Paranoia Party
description: An online party game where you need to find and kill your friends that hide among a group of NPC's.

name: Adventure Trip: Amazing World 2
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

name: Quiz Thiz Spain: Bronze Edition
description: Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Warehouse Simulator: Forklift Driver
description: Manage specialized equipment used in warehouses and become a professional in your field. And the well-developed mechanics of the movement of specialized warehouse equipment allows you to experience the sensations of working in a warehouse without leaving your computer.

name: Truc Bidule
description: Truc Bidule is yogui's hack filled with many unique levels of all sorts. Including many different graphics and musics, self-made ASM, new powerups, hidden moons in each levels who unlock secrets, and simply unique and amazing level design.

name: Kiss of Death
description: Kiss of Death is the first and only book of the Kiss of Death series.

name: Minecraft: Legends - Deluxe Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Evil Dungeon
description:
Evil Dungeon is an RPG-based fantasy dungeon crawler for the C64.

The story of Alrik, a young adventurer who has to master his first quest.
Fight against monsters, search for treasures, and plan your next steps to escape the Evil Dungeon labyrinth.

name: The Backrooms
description: The survivors have noclipped out of reality and are now trapped in the Backrooms. Now all you have to do is survive because you are not alone...

name: Com__et
description: A queer visual novel about being locked into a path, and having _______ words hidden from You. Find Your way to discover what's missing and reach Your ____ End.

name: HoloCure Update 0.5
description:
This update added the Achievement, Stamp, Enchantment and Fandom Systems to the game as well as full mouse support and general changes to most existing aspects of the game.

The new content includes 9 new characters from Hololive Japan's generation 1 and 2, 11 items. 7 collabs, 3 stages, 2 weapons and various new outfits for the 20 characters already in the game.

name: Liminal Doom
description: Liminal Doom its a set of Boom maps based of liminal space images. While some areas are inspired by images, they do not resamble them completly.

name: Lara Croft: The Last Plague
description: This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

name: Raging Bytes
description: Raging Bytes is a story-driven zombie RPG full of drama and pixels! Survive the raging bytes! With difficulty levels for all kinds of players, dive into this post-apocalyptic world and face zombies in turn-based battles!

name: The Farmer Was Replaced
description: Program and optimize a drone to automate a farm and watch it do the work for you. Collect resources to unlock better technology and become the most efficient farmer in the world. Improve your problem solving and coding skills.

name: Coloring Pixels: Gems and Minerals Pack
description: This Gems and Minerals-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Shiny gems, fascinating minerals and useful ores! Delve into the ground to see what wonders await.

name: Slingshot Battle
description: VR Multi-person physical combat games have distinctive weapons and roles. Weapons include explosive slingshot, frozen slingshot and water gun. There are four kinds of characters, chicken, ghost, mage and soldier. Each character plays differently.

name: Canine
description: Canine is a PSX style horror game about a boy looking for his dog, kidnapped by an evil corporation that runs experiments with pets.

name: Urban Flow: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Who Run the City
description: Who Run The City is a Third-Person Multiplayer funny game where gangsters are doing illegal stuff (stealing money, selling drugs ...) and the police have to stop them.

name: Parts Unknown
description: Parts Unknown is a single player fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting platformers with a unique twist.

name: Pizza Tycoon
description: The economic simulation Pizza Tycoon offers a number of hot new toppings! Work your way through a challenging campaign to rise from a simple pizza baker in the streets of Rome to the owner of the world's most successful pizza chain!

name: She Wants Me Dead + Clumsy Rush
description: Angering your cat is never a good idea. It's even worse, if your pet turns out to be a maniacal genius. Help Max escape from his fate and survive this purrfect punishment. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family. Why pick one when you can have them both.

name: Fluffy Horde + Cyber Protocol
description: The Fluffy Horde is coming! Save your crops from the enemy and try to withstand the rabbit Tsunami. Want to feel like a cyberpunk hacker? Save your friend by beating 100 levels of Cyber Protocol.

name: UnderDungeon + Cyber Protocol
description: Become the deadliest delivery... cat in the world. Intense fights, multiple weapons and demanding boss fights. Join Kimuto on his hardest first day on the job. You can also try your puzzle solving skills in Cyber Protocol. An arcade puzzle game set in a Cyberpunk world. Why pick when you can have them both.

name: It Happened Here: Streaming Lives - Collector's Edition
description: Fire up your audio equipment and get ready to unravel a chilling murder case in this heart-pounding mystery!

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Dark Arts Pack
description:
This pack includes:
- Thestral Mount
- Dark Arts Cosmetic Set
- Dark Arts Battle Arena

name: My Lovely Pets: Collector's Edition
description: Search for interesting items in relaxing and beautiful places, play your favourite mini games, find cute Pets.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 11
description:
Your main goal is to gather information as you explore the site of the Triela Tragedy, a nightmarish massacre long past.

This season introduces a crafting system, where you can pick up materials you find around the map and give them to your friends back at camp. They then can make items for you that will give you an edge in combat. It also has scenes where you play as a critical new character, providing deeper immersion into the story.

Do you have the courage to step into the shadows and uncover the truth about the devils of this world?

name: Clay Soldiers
description: The war rages on, choose to side with the Mercenaries, the Undead, the Angels, and more! Play through the single-player campaign, unifying the factions. Fight against other players and AI in the battleground's mode! Or strive for a conquest that takes you through the ages in war mode.

name: Miskal
description: Miskal is a calm and peaceful simulator game which you can create your own island.

name: Train Simulator Classic: New Zealand Kb Class Steam Loco
description: Experience heavy-haul steam in style with the latest addition to the Train Simulator Classic New Zealand loco lineup, the striking Kb Class from NZTS Workshops is ready for work on the detailed Midland Line.

name: Mane Box
description: A Friday Night Funkin' mod based on Pinkie Box.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe
description: This is the biggest trip in Europe, where you will visit 10 countries and 24 cities.

name: Camphor
description: A short 'bitsy poem' about my feelings towards fireflies. Made in the span of around 2 hours on a whim on the 9th of February, 2023. Plays for 30 seconds to a minute. Inspired by a recent listen to 'The Campfire Headphase' by Boards of Canada. You play as a worm in a forest swerving through rocks and trees to see fireflies.

name: The Salt Keep
description: The Salt Keep is a text adventure (think interactive fiction with Choose Your Own Adventure and RPG mechanics) and should feel familiar to fans of classic gamebooks and fantasy fiction in general.

name: The Missing Parts of Maria Gwozdek
description: The Missing Parts of Maria Gwozdek is a dark fantasy visual novel about fulfilling your aspirations by sacrificing parts of yourself. Literally.

name: Stuffo the Puzzle Bot
description: A laid-back but smart puzzle game. Stuffo is the last remaining puzzle bot stuck in a world filled with bite-sized brain-teasers. Help Stuffo to solve the mind-bending puzzles by using various blocks to climb, push and teleport your way to the exit.

name: Web Crawlies
description: Web Crawlies - Due to a Lab Accident at the Pesticide Factory, All of the pests on Earth have grown 100 times their normal size, and the air is toxic to humans. You and your team are the last remaining people, can you survive?

name: Girl Fantasy
description: "Girl Fantasy" is a visual novel with a theme of youth. It tells the love story of the woman who went to play with the man during the summer vacation and stayed at the man's house, then moved the man with "sincerity" step by step, and finally stayed with the man.

name: 7 Sins: Lost in Labyrinth
description: “7 Sins: Lost in Labyrinth” A Survival Horror Game, based on the Cutie Characters and World of 7 Sexy Sins Series. You have but one goal: survive and escape the hellish mazes! Run or Hide, Scream or Cry. Find the secrets and beware of the jump scares that will shake into your naughty heart!

name: Beta-Sixdouze
description: A gargantuan rose looms in the night sky, poised to strike at any moment. Enter Yosuke, a combat pilot on an unlikely mission: to take to the stars with the mysterious Hanaco and contain Earth's greatest threat! But will this mismatched duo find common ground in time? And who is Hanaco, really...?

name: Robot Room Cleaner
description: Robot Room Cleaner is a satisfying and fun robot vacuum simulator game

name: Astral Coconut
description: A skating based adventure in a vast alien world.

name: Sigformation
description: A hardcore puzzle game about digital circuits

name: 15 Levels
description: 15 Levels is a puzzle game.

name: Ryo: The Haunted Office
description: Ryo: The Haunted Office is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game where you play as a Paranormal enthusiast who have to investigate the haunted office for the proof of the paranormal.

name: Sakura Battle
description: Relive the fighting of the 'Sakura Arms' with cute animated SD graphics!

name: Hidden Mars
description: Can you find the cat Felicat on Mars? They are in rockets, space stations and rovers.

name: Merge Me!
description: An idle merge game for your fun and relaxation. Combine various monsters, buy upgrades, unlock powerful artifacts and try to complete the game.

name: Aria: Genesis
description: Blast, bomb and bang you way to finding a cure that can save your boyfriend from dying. After all, how else will you be able to enjoy his di- I mean, his amazing personality for years to come?

name: Mayhem Heroes
description: Mayhem Heroes is a frenetic beat'em up where you have to take down as many opponents as possible and, ideally, be the last one standing. Use punches, kicks, special moves and power ups to send your opponents flying out of the arena. Play with up to 4 friends and show them who's the boss!

name: Spider Hunter
description: Make new friends, but don't forget the old ones!

name: Sweets Pusher Friends
description: This is an online cooperative pusher game where you scoop sweets and get them by pushing them on the table and catching them in the box. Cooperate with other players to complete mini-games and win various prizes.

name: Hentai Hasshaku
description: Hentai Hasshaku is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of hasshaku-sama and unique sexy girl. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Banana Attack VR
description: Shoot zombie limbs off and watch their ragdoll bodies fall then cook their delicious remains over the fire and feed it to your cute little fox!

name: Ragdoll Rage: Heroes Arena
description: Looking for a multiplayer party game on Nintendo Switch? Ragdoll Rage: Heroes Arena is what you need: ragdoll physics, deadly fights among traps, and tons of fun! Ragdoll Rage is an incredible shooting duel in the battlegrounds full of traps.

name: Sector 598
description: Play as the Hacker, trapped in the virtual dome known as Sector 598 being lead and controlled by the ADMIN for the past 28 years. Things change once the Hacker finds out there is something sinister going on, can you fight your way out and escape in this turn based strategy game?

name: Domination: War of Nations
description: This is an online turn-based board game in which each player will need to eliminate their opponents in order to conquer territories and clear the way to win the game.

name: Temple and Secrets
description: Temple and Secrets - 3D, a game in which you, being a treasure hunter, will look for precious items

name: Invasion
description: Invasion - is the simplest 3D shooter with surviving elements in which you must survive on an unknown planet.

name: Legion of Doom
description: Casual yet action-packed, reverse bullet hell RPG. You don't have to dodge - They do.

name: Aconite
description: Nowadays, it's very hard for people to earn really big money by fair means. And if someone wants to have at least some kind of fortune, then one has to make it somehow. So Mireille found a way to make her fortune.

name: Detective Super Star
description: Join the famous Detective Doyle to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game.

name: Bumblebee: Little Bee Adventure
description: Bumblebee: Little Bee Adventure is a story-driven, narrative 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bee on its journey to find a new home. On its quest to find a beautiful and fitting it discovers distant places, friendly and calm animals, and amazing and dangerously habitats.

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Collector's Edition
description: This collector's edition comes with a floating wand and book case and the game in a steel case and collector's box.

name: Mystic Gate
description: One day, a "gate" created by the gods suddenly appeared in the human world. Adventurers challenge the "ordeal" that awaits them beyond the gate in order to make their wishes come true. A roguelike dungeon exploration shooting game!

name: Loot Express Delivery Service
description: Loot Express Delivery Service is a top-down 2D pixel art game.You are about to play the commander in this exploration game and you try to capture valuable items from an alien planet.Complete the missions efficiently and lead your new company to success.

name: The Maiden, the Butler, and the Witch
description: A classic-style turn-based RPG. Irina must leave her home and embark on a journey to complete her training to become a witch. However, the Demon Lord has built a castle on the island, and unleashed monsters who threaten its citizens.

name: Moxie's Lemon
description: Moxie's Lemon is a short cinematic platformer about pettiness and frustration.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Hogwarts Legacy is an immersive, open-world action RPG set in the world first introduced in the Harry Potter books. Now you can take control of the action and be at the center of your own adventure in the wizarding world. Embark on a journey through familiar and new locations as you explore and discover fantastic beasts, customize your character and craft potions, master spell casting, upgrade talents, and become the wizard you want to be. Discover the feeling of living at Hogwarts as you make allies, battle Dark wizards, and ultimately decide the fate of the wizarding world. Your legacy is what you make of it.

name: Engineering: Mystery of the Ancient Clock
description: Play the fascinating match-3 game "Engineering: The Mystery of the Ancient Clock" and clear up the secrets of the Ancient Chronograph.

name: Color Fan
description: An anime themed color by number coloring app.

name: Rally Champion Advanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Mimic Dungeon
description: Help the Wizard escape the dungeon by killing enemies with the staff that makes everyone copy his moves.

name: FIFA Manager 2023
description: A mod of the EA FIFA Manager 2013 bringing players and clubs from 2023 to the orginal game that is no longer continued by EA Sports.

name: Quick Choice Girl
description: An educational running game combined with fun quizzes. How many can you answer?

name: Burger Please!
description:
Welcome to Burger Please!, the ultimate burger shop simulation game!
Dive into the world of fast-food madness and cook & build your own deluxe burger empire.

Immerse yourself in the world of restaurant business with this simulator game, where you'll not only handle hamburgers but all aspects of the fast food industry. From opening the store, cooking burgers, upgrading your drive-thru counter, to expanding and even opening a new branch – experience it all in the dynamic burger shop business.

name: Whiteout Survival
description:
Whiteout Survival is a survival strategy game to center on a glacial apocalypse theme. Fascinating mechanics and intricate details await you to explore!

The catastrophic decline in global temperatures has wreaked havoc on human society. Those who have made it out of their crumbling homes are now faced with a new set of challenges: vicious blizzards, ferocious beasts, and opportunistic bandits looking to prey on their despair.

As the head of the last city in these icy wastes, you are the only hope for humanity's continued existence. Can you successfully guide the survivors through the ordeal of adapting to the hostile environment and re-establishing civilization? The time for you to rise to the occasion is now!

name: Hair Salon: Cool Stories
description: Do you want to be the best hairdresser? You will have to answer correctly all your clients' questions. Be the best professional. Don't lie! Or they will think you don't listen to them.

name: Myst Mobile
description:
Journey to Myst Island and begin to unravel the mystery you have been thrust into. As you learn what happened on the island, you will find yourself playing a key role in an epic story whose ending has not yet been written.

The island is full of secrets – learn your surroundings and discover what you can interact with. Each puzzle you solve will bring you closer to exploring more of the island, and reveal methods to reach other stunning and surreal worlds called “Ages”.

With an in-app purchase to unlock the other Ages of Myst, you will see even greater challenges await you, and discover deeper connections and puzzles that Myst has to offer. Uncover a story of ruthless family betrayal, and make choices that will affect both you, and the world of Myst itself.

name: Animal Puzzle World
description: Puzzles with awesome animals!

name: Red Bird Adventure: Classic Physics Puzzle
description: A popular puzzle game based on real physics. Find a way to save the birds!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Hashiwokakero
description: Draw as many connecting lines as indicated by the numbers in the circles.

name: Arcade Archives: Magical Speed
description: Ready, set, go!

name: Redout 2: Winter Pack
description: Race across the glacial plains and lava-stricken canyons of Mercury in the Redout 2 - Winter Pack, featuring 3 new tracks, 28 career events and new music tracks by Dance With The Dead!

name: Vampire Survivors: Chaos Update
description:
The free "Chaos Update" brings a new challenge stage inspired heavily by another video game franchise, along with two new relics and three achievements for Vampire Survivors players to collect. Plus, one particular relic will receive a power-up under the right conditions. The launch of this update coincides with release version 1.3.0.

The Chaos Update's new stage is titled "Bat Country" and features only the titular winged creatures for players to take out in droves. The Chaos Malachite was revealed as one of the relics, which is stated to have a special interaction with the skeletal Mortaccio upon attaining level 80.

The update's name and the new level are clear homages to the Sonic the Hedgehog series. In a gameplay trailer for the update, special stage elements inspired by 1991's Sonic the Hedgehog and 1994's Sonic the Hedgehog 3 were seen, with the Bat Country level's background referencing the latter's Blue Spheres stages. Even the Chaos Malachite relic is a tongue-in-cheek reference to the Chaos Emeralds from the Sonic series.

name: Metabolis
description: In this surreal platformer, released in 1985 for the Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum, you have been transformed into a bird, and must fight to save the human race from the invading Kremins by exploring an expansive world and collecting useful items.

name: King Fishing
description: King Fishing classic fish species and cool special effects, all kinds of goldfish, featured fish, let you love, bring super experience, retain childhood fishing memories, innovation to join the room theme gameplay, release skills sprint list!

name: Sex Simulator: The Yacht
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring realistic high definition graphics and characters. You play the role a guy having fun on a luxurious yacht anchored near warm tropical islands.

name: HuaBing
description: Pictorial Pie is a large multi-person online role-playing game in the Xianxia sandbox. With the growth of martial arts, the construction of the Zongmen and the Cave, and the free PVP battle, dangers and opportunities can be seen everywhere.

name: The Cursed Knight
description: The Cursed Knight is an action / platform / shoot‘em up game, based on a « die and retry » style and made with love and passion to pay tribute to the games made in the 90s.

name: They Love Them
description: They Love Them is a romantic match-3 puzzle game. Impress your date by showering them with gifts and affection. Match 3 gifts to send them to your partner. Quickly send gifts to maintain a combo. Play in a relaxing date mode, or rack up points as quickly as you can in the Speed dating mode!

name: Roman Empire vs. Barbarians
description: Barbarians keep expanding all over the place and you’ve been summoned as the hero who’s going to stop them. You’re provided with a Roman Empire tower that comes with a powerful catapult and a team of warriors. Will that be enough to stop the barbarian invasion?

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Light and Mirror Room
description:
Explore the mysterious floor that exists in a certain building and solve the mystery.
Can you escape Light and Mirror Room?

name: Tal: Arctic 5
description: Tal: Arctic 5 - the final part of the adventures of an unknown creature. Go through all the mazes and be reunited with your family.

name: Taxi Driver Simulator: Car Parking
description: Become a good taxi driver in the city and complete the car parking mission.

name: Garbage Truck Simulator
description: The compactor is hungry! 3D simulation game with authentic trucks and realtime destruction physics. Fill the compactor with garbage and keep pressing the button until everything has been smashed. Drive the truck from one stop to the next and collect every pile of garbage from the streets.

name: Changeling Charade
description: Put on a magical disguise to find true love! As a changeling, will you stay among the human nobility, or join the fairy revolution?

name: Rethm: Once Upon a Time
description: An RPG that takes you on a journey through inverted time. Rain falls from below to above, and defeated enemies come back to life. Encounters become partings, and the story moves toward its beginning.

name: Subnet: Escape Room Adventure
description: Do you have what it takes to puzzle your way through the underground subway system and stop the drkForce hacker groups underground exploit? Use your puzzle solving skills to make your way through the town and underground to track down the hackers and help stop their plans before they escape!

name: Reverse Woman of Human Ball
description: Ball Transportation instant-death and race game 'Reverse Woman of Human Ball'. You steer 156mph 'Reverse Woman' and do jobs transporting ball like human 'Human Ball'. To be delicate to deal with vulnerable human-ball like eggs and to be bravery to transport human-ball within the limit time.

name: Perseverance: Complete Edition
description: Persevere through family troubles, small-town drama, and… zombie apocalypse as Jack and Karen in Perseverance: Complete Edition!
